name: MECHATENA
description:
Created for the 2022 Greenlight Jam - Prototype phase

This is a prototype of the turn-based match-3 combat that is going to be the core gameplay in MECHATENA

Instructions: Click on two orbs to swap them (you can swap any two adjacent orbs).

On a successful match of 3 orbs in a row or column, those orbs will disappear.

If the color of the orbs matches the color of one of your weapons, that weapon's damage will be multiplied that turn.

Your turn ends when your energy (yellow number) reaches 0, at which point you and the enemy deal damage to each other.

There's no fail or win state in this prototype because I forgot lol
